programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep6
programme.desc: Fountains - Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth to save Puss' old mentor, El Guante Blanco.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep21
programme.desc: The Case Of The Knocked Down Fences - While Hoof is about to do his obstacle course, he finds all the fences knocked down. He blames Bling, who was jealous of the lucky wings he wears on his hoofs, but Bling assures she's got nothing to do with it ! Noddy investigates to settle their argument.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep22
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unfinished Building - Strange accidents keep happening on the building site. Clockwork Mouse is convinced that someone is trying to stop them finishing the building. Noddy investigates and finds out things aren't quite as they seem...

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep23
programme.desc: The Case Of The Damaged Magic Box - Pat-Pat is doing a magic show but she discovers her magic box is broken. Noddy investigates: Who broke the magic box? He needs to find out soon so that Pat Pat's show can take place.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep24
programme.desc: The Case Of The Lost Pirates - Armed with a brand new sat-nav from Fuse, the Pirates head off on The Pirate Challenge, sailing all around Toyland. But when they fail to arrive at their first stop in Toy Green, Noddy investigates what's happened. He must set the Pirates back on course to complete the challenge by the end of the day.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep21
programme.desc: Jungle Jiggles - Raa Raa wants a partner to dance a noisy stompy dance with. All the animals have their own way of dancing, apart from Zebby who says she is too shy to dance… or is she?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep22
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Great Big Noise - Raa Raa has decided that the jingly jangly jungle is not jingly or jangly enough. He and his friends make lots of noise, but soon learn that they need to work together to make a wonderful jingly jangly jungle noise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep23
programme.desc: Raa Raa's Nap Time Story - Topsy is going to read Zebby a naptime story. Raa Raa wants to make the noises to go with the story. But they are all too loud and poor Zebby can't get to sleep. Can Raa Raa find any quiet sleepy noises in the Jingly Jangly Jungle?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep24
programme.desc: Go Bananas - Ooo Ooo is having a banana party. Raa Raa and the others have picked masses of lovely bananas, but how are they going to transport them back to Ooo Ooo's in time for the party?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep21
programme.desc: Mum's The Word - Christine (Big Chris' mum) is visiting Silver hatch. As is Mamma Mia… serious competition ensues!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep22
programme.desc: How The Hatch Was Won - Tin Top is feeling homesick so Big Chris tries to cheer him up. But who could that pesky varmint causing trouble on the track be?!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep23
programme.desc: Go Gadget James And Maxi - Maxi is jealous of all of James' gadgets, or more precisely, the attention the other cars give him. He persuades Molecom to devise some gadgets for him… with hilarious results

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep24
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor Or Bust - Mr Carburettor has commissioned a bust of himself for Silver Hatch. Disaster strikes when it is dropped, Big Chris tries to make amends, while Marsha distracts Mr Carburettor and the reporter

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep11
programme.desc: Merry Scary Christmas / Time Waits For No Ghost - Merry Scary Christmas It's Christmas and Casper wants to spend the holiday with his human pal, Jimmy. Time Waits for No Ghost When Casper discovers a clock that can stop time, everyone wants to use it for his or her own purpose.

programme.title: Casper's Scare School Ep12
programme.desc: Ghostbust A Move / My Fair Harpy - Ghostbust a Move When Jimmy's dad decides to move the family away from Deedstown, Casper and his friends vow to stop Mr. Bradley from selling their house. My Fair Harpy The Winter Chill Dance is coming up and Ra is determined to be king.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the other’s daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep3
programme.desc: Family Fun Night - The Templetons head to a new family restaurant only to run into Bootsy Calico!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep4
programme.desc: Formula for Menace: A Dekker Moonboots Mystery - When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep3
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Horrible Hostilities of the Homework Hydra - When George and Harold go back in time to stop the invention of homework, they realize they also eliminated the most important thing in the world: comic books

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep4
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Vexing Villainy of the Vile Vimpire - When Erica makes fun of George and Harold’s latest and greatest comic, they make a comic about her becoming a vampire

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep3
programme.desc: Wherefore Art Thou Trollhunter? - Jim is not welcomed by the Trolls as their new Trollhunter, and he suffers a humiliating defeat at the hands of Draal

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep4
programme.desc: Gnome Your Enemy - Jim undertakes his first Trollhunting mission by starting small: he must shrink down to eight inches tall to apprehend a mischievous gnome.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep2
programme.desc: Eye Of The Beholder Pt 2 - Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders journey to Glacier Island in search of the Snow Wraith, a fearsome dragon that holds key to the Dragon Eye's mysteries.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep12
programme.desc: A Stinky Situation /Fire-Fly - When Twig gets sprayed by a skunk trying to save his friends, the Mighty Ones agree not to ruin his hero moment by telling him that the stinks. Instead, they try to wash the smell off of him without him knowing. / The Mighty Ones are cold so when they hear about a wonderful creature known as a "fire-fly," they decide it will be the answer to their problems.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep3
programme.desc: Enter The Fanaloka - The evil genius Karl sets out to destroy King Julien. When both Clover and Maurice are captured, King Julien must save them from his new nemesis.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep4
programme.desc: Empty Is The Head - Exhausted from settling his subjects' disputes, King Julien replaces himself with a dummy king so he can play hooky, unwittingly sparking a rebellion.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep3
programme.desc: Clubbing - Homesick, Cleo tries joining some school clubs to feel better. Her homesickness has an unexpected and destructive effect.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep4
programme.desc: Humility - Cleo’s over confidence gets her friends captured, and to rescue them she must convince a tribe of laidback aliens she can master their high values of humility, serenity, and caution.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep3
programme.desc: Lucky And The Mysterious Map - During a camping trip Jim gives Lucky and the girls a treasure map that sends them on the adventure of a lifetime

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep2
programme.desc: School Of Hard Rocks - When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep7
programme.desc: Prank Day / Adventures In Dinkles-Sitting - When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep12
programme.desc: A Stinky Situation /Fire-Fly - When Twig gets sprayed by a skunk trying to save his friends, the Mighty Ones agree not to ruin his hero moment by telling him that the stinks. Instead, they try to wash the smell off of him without him knowing. / The Mighty Ones are cold so when they hear about a wonderful creature known as a "fire-fly," they decide it will be the answer to their problems.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep13
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep13
programme.desc: Total Nightmare - When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep14
programme.desc: Team Astrid - After Dagur attacks Berk, Astrid trauns a crew of back-up Dragon riders to battle back, although no one anticipates how soon the strike will come.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep13
programme.desc: Six Well-Placed Kittens - When Bootsy's plan of 6 strategically placed kittens brings the whole town down, Mega Fat is forced to team with Boss Baby

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep14
programme.desc: As the Diaper Changes - When Grandma Templeton comes to stay, she forces Boss Baby into Tim's room but they struggle to be roommates, and meanwhile, Baby Corp's new CEO trusts Boss Baby with the new Stinkless Serum

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep13
programme.desc: End of the Dragon Master - Po, the kids, and the new Panda Guardians must work together to defeat Jindiao once and for all, and get a visit from an unlikely source

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep14
programme.desc: Journey to the East - Feeling a little bored with their new hero life, Po and the kids are excited to accept an important invitation to the Forbidden City. Meanwhile, there's a curious disturbance deep in Panda Village...

programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero – but being “brave” quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can't Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Clangy Bangy Crocky - Crocky has got his foot stuck in a bucket, which makes lots of noise every time he walks. It's great fun making lots of noise at first, but soon Crocky tires of the bucket stuck on his foot. How can Raa Raa and the other jungle animals help Crocky remove the bucket?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa's New Noise - Raa Raa wants to find the perfect noise to partner his friend Huffty in a tune. He hears an amazing new noise but does not know what made it… he sets out on a noisy discovery to find out how to recreate this wonderful new noise.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep27
programme.desc: Crocky's Wobbly Tooth - Crocky has got a wobbly tooth. He really wants it to fall out. He and his friends try all sorts of different ways to try and help the tooth fall out… will any of them work?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep28
programme.desc: Littlest Laugh - Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo are trying to find out who is the funniest animal in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. But they soon realise that they are much funnier when they are together.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep25
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Hatch Is - Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.desc: T-Rex Ranch brings you another awesome fun-packed collection of Jurassic dinosaur videos !

programme.desc: T-Rex Ranch brings you another awesome fun-packed collection of Jurassic dinosaur videos !

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep147

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Getting Glasses with Magenta - It's an exciting day for Magenta because she's getting glasses! We play a special game of Blue and Magenta's Clues to find out what Magenta wants to do when she gets her glasses and we get to go with her to meet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep813

programme.desc: Captain Steel / Wash Out - Whilst some of the Deer Squad down with flu, Sir Steel tries to become a superhero with disastrous results. // Sir Steel 'borrows' water from Crystal Lake for his Water Park in the city, but things soon go wrong!

programme.desc: Paddington's Space Adventure / Paddington's Blackberry Treasure - Join Paddington as he takes off & becomes the world's first Bearonaut thanks to the Brown family! // Jonathan, Judy & Paddington pick all the blackberries in the garden but Mr. Curry seems to think some are his- should they give them back?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102

programme.desc: Relay Tales / The Barbababies' World - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep122
programme.desc: Barbabright Has a Secret / Super Duper Cool - Barbabright acts strangely. What is he hiding ? The Barbabbabies will do anything to find out. // The Barbapapa decide to save energy. But their efforts are undermined by Barbabright and Barbabelle who build a secret energy-consuming project.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep121

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep115

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep918
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Mer-Race - The Paw Patrol take part in a big mer-race, but must come to the rescue when Moby's cheating puts Puplantis in serious danger.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep914
programme.desc: Aqua Pups Save a Floating Castle - When an unhappy Merpup tries to float Puplantis to the surface, it's up to the Paw Patrol and their newest member Coral (Skye's long-lost merpup cousin) to save the city and stop him.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: The Cave Barbapapas / The Little Monsters - The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep213

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep230

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep231

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep232

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep233

programme.desc: The Thinking Squad - Clues house! While playing "superheroes" we hear a super strange noise. We play Blue's Clues to figure out where it's coming from. On the way, we learn about the powers our Superfriends have too!

programme.desc: Dora's Pirate Adventure - Dora and friends are about to put on a pirate play when the Pirate Piggies steal their treasure chest and costumes.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Lola's Air Display / Down The Sewers - Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep217
programme.desc: Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear - Paddington helps to hatch an egg, but it takes ages and when it finally cracks open he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. and Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Lemonade - Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: Barbazoo Can't Say ''No'' / The Doppelganger - Barbazoo is ready to help. But Barbabright and Barbabelle abuse his kindness and drive him crazy. // By chance, Barbazoo realizes he can imitate Barbapapa. He uses this opportunity to distribute chores to his brothers and sisters. Will they find out?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait - The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: Roly's First Day - As Roly makes his usual noise in the Clubhouse, Duggee and the Squirrels reminisce about how completely different Roly was when he first arrived.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep4
programme.desc: The Spot the Difference Badge - Duggee looks different, but what is it? By playing some looking games, the Squirrels learn how best to spot the difference.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) Ep5
programme.desc: Happy's First Day - Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) Ep37
programme.desc: Mount Rushmore, USA - When the Grimbots add Glitch's face to those of the presidents on Mount Rushmore they cause a major mudslide.

programme.desc: Caernarfon Castle, Wales - How will the Go Jetters retrieve Xuli's treasured 'Academy Ace' flying trophy from Caernarfon Castle?

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep17
programme.desc: Flat and Steep - Kit and Pup are having a race. Can you see who is cycling on the flat path and who is cycling up the steep hill? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator work out how to get a ball to roll onto a target using a ramp.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep3
programme.desc: Top - Dee encourages a friend to say 'top' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see lots of different tops - a new top, a soft top, a scratchy top and some matchy tops!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Karate Chops / Taco The Town - Used to being top dog, Carl can't handle when Adelaide joins his karate class and becomes the star student. // Hector starts selling Rosa's delicious tacos but gets overwhelmed when they're more popular than the mercado!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Alpaca Lies / Rocket Plan - Ronnie Anne and Bobby have to deal with an old friend of Arturo's-Al the Alpaca, but Al has it out for the kids. // Abuelo helps CJ build a rocket, but when things aren't going well, Abuelo tells a little fib to preserve CJ's feelings.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Going Overboard / Walk Don't Run - Ronnie Anne begs Tio Carlos to teach her some moves when she finds out he is a famous skateboarder. // In order to buy a new skateboard, Ronnie Anne and Sid start a dog-walking business.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep185
programme.desc: It Came From Goo Lagoon - A giant goo bubble emerges from Goo Lagoon and threatens all of Bikini Bottom--except for Plankton, who plans to use the bubble for his own evil ends.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep186
programme.desc: Safe Deposit Krabs / Plankton's Pet - Mr. Krabs gets trapped in Bikini Bottom’s brand-new bank, and it’s up to SpongeBob & Patrick to save him. // After failing again to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton gets a pet to cheer himself up.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep213
programme.desc: The Getaway - When SpongeBob mistakes an escaped convict for his driving instructor, it's the new teacher who learns a lesson.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Squidina's Little Helper / I Smell a Pat - The Patrick Star Show is interrupted by a most peculiar stench. // Squidina hires an assistant who's a little too good at his job.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gas Station Vacation / Bunny the Barbarian - The Star Family heads to their favorite resort. // Bunny goes on a mid-day adventure to a forgotten age.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Quest for Tire / Cabin of Curiosities - The weekly food delivery truck goes missing, so the campers must hunt it down like their primal ancestors. // A mysterious cabin of odd campers have frightful fun with SpongeBob and Patrick after dark.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Smurfs Show - Gargamel plants a crystal ball to spy on the Smurfs, but they turn the tables on him with a fabricated drama.

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Smurfboards / Monkey See, Monkey Do - Vanity and Jokey start riding smurfboards around the village, but Brainy believes they're dangerous. // The Magic Supply Store mixes up Papa Smurf's and Gargamel's delivery orders, leaving Papa Smurf with a monkey!

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Witch Hitch / Part of the Pack - Toralei & Lagoona threaten to expose Draculaura as a witch, compromising her spot as Head Fearleader. // Clawdeen's friendship with Frankie & Draculaura is tested when she's invited to join Monster High's werewolf pack.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep141
programme.desc: The Curse of the Hex / The Main Drain - Madame Hagfish puts a hex on the Krusty Krab. // SpongeBob and Patrick search for a legendary drain on the ocean floor.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Sleepover / The 'B' Word - Parker has a sleepover for the first time and enlists Angus's help to make it as fun as possible. // Parker and Angus go the distance to try and give Russell a bath before her stench becomes destructive.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Unhappy Campers / Leprechauns 2 - Never having made it to dark, the Middlemost Post decide their latest camping trip will finally be the one. // Bud and Buddy return to the mountain, claiming they're reformed leprechauns no longer seeking Parker's gold.

programme.desc: Guest reporter Craig Reucassel goes off the tourist track in Fiji to see how communities are dealing with the reality of climate change. Rising sea levels and cyclones are forcing Fijians to change their lives to survive.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep71
programme.desc: The day's top stories and the latest news on Easter Monday. Stay in touch with developments across the mornings and all the news and information you need from across Australia and around the globe. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Women in Sport Spotlight Ep1
programme.desc: ABC News puts the spotlight on women making a big impact in the sporting world - from the grassroots through to the elite level, with a focus on women from under-represented backgrounds. Presented by Amanda Shalala.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep71
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Costa is bowled over by terrific turf; Clarence traces a green web of gardens; Hannah tours a downsized productive patch; Jerry shares bulbs for the subtropics; Millie renovates a wheelbarrow; we meet bird-loving ecologist.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Perth couple Angelo and Kasi are obsessed with concrete, particularly in 1950s Brutalist architecture, but when they get the drawings back from their architect, they're in for a surprise that will challenge all their ideas.

programme.title: Pandemic Warriors Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - We meet the head of Tonga's national broadcaster and learn how she and her team kept life-saving information going out on the airwaves as Tonga faced a devastating triple disaster.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep24
programme.desc: No one in the footy world would have predicted reigning premiers Geelong would be the only winless team and last on the ladder. Can the Cats fight back against one of their fiercest rivals Hawthorn in Easter Monday footy?

programme.title: The Drum Ep56
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's lives everyday, encouraging thoughtful and challenging debate with a diverse panel. Presented by John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep71
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and today's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep53
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep71
programme.desc: More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. Our network of reporters uncover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Meredith Sheehan.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather Ewart hitches a ride with singer-songwriter Josh Arnold across western Queensland. On a Musical Road Trip they make stars of local kids, teaching them how to celebrate their community by writing their own town anthem.

programme.title: ABC Nightly News Ep71
programme.desc: Stay in touch with the latest breaking news and comprehensive coverage of the day's top stories. With reporters in more places, ABC News connects communities and tells the stories that matter to you. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep8
programme.desc: Guest reporter Craig Reucassel goes off the tourist track in Fiji to see how communities are dealing with the reality of climate change. Rising sea levels and cyclones are forcing Fijians to change their lives to survive.

programme.title: The World Ep71
programme.desc: Know what's going on in our world. Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: Q+A Ep11
programme.desc: Sr. 16 - Australian politics is changing as a new generation makes its mark. Liberal MPs confirm they'll campaign against the Voice to Parliament. Some relief with interest rates on hold. Plus where does religion fit with politics?

programme.title: 7.30 Ep53
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Zeroing In: Carbon Neutral 2050
programme.desc: Trees don't just add a splash of green to our cities. They absorb CO2, and even improve our sense of wellbeing. Together with a US public broadcaster, we zero in on the benefits of "urban forests."

programme.title: Zeroing In: Carbon Neutral 2050
programme.desc: Hydrogen is a clean energy with a proven track record. But it's woefully underused. Together with a US public broadcaster, we look at how this element is being brought back in from the cold.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Crafting Nambu ironware kettles is a centuries-old tradition in Iwate Prefecture. One studio is changing its work policies to attract younger artisans. But can innovation keep this tradition alive?

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #3 I'm from Vietnam. / Learn how to say where you're from. The formula is the name of the place, followed by "kara kimashita".

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: A festival of floats decorated with locally grown vegetables parades the streets in early October in gratitude for an abundant harvest.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Hike a snow-covered mountain and explore the superb scenery enlivened by the bitter cold of winter. We'll find monstrous creations of ice and snow found only in winter. What wonderous sights await?

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Visit the Sanuki region to try a local delicacy loved by cats. Watch a kitty's owner make traditional roof tiles, and stroll around a famous shrine with another kitty.

programme.title: Darwin'S Amazing Animals
programme.desc: Macaques can be found across Japan. We discover a troop on an island in the northeast with some amazing greeting and dietary habits as well as infighting and other drama not so different from our own.

programme.title: Time-Lapse Journey
programme.desc: For over 100 years, Hirosaki Park in Aomori Prefecture has been a beloved spot to see sakura blossoms. See the multifaceted beauty of sakura blossoms through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: U&I
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the city of Valletta, the capital of the Republic of Malta. Designated as a World Heritage Site, it's a walled city built by Christian Knights during the 16th century.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: NHK Documentary
programme.desc: In a farming area in northern Japan a giant brown bear is attacking cows. Have human actions helped create the situation? We follow efforts to find the animal and understand what led to its behavior.

programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Zeroing In: Carbon Neutral 2050
programme.desc: Trees don't just add a splash of green to our cities. They absorb CO2, and even improve our sense of wellbeing. Together with a US public broadcaster, we zero in on the benefits of "urban forests."

programme.title: Zeroing In: Carbon Neutral 2050
programme.desc: Hydrogen is a clean energy with a proven track record. But it's woefully underused. Together with a US public broadcaster, we look at how this element is being brought back in from the cold.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Crafting Nambu ironware kettles is a centuries-old tradition in Iwate Prefecture. One studio is changing its work policies to attract younger artisans. But can innovation keep this tradition alive?

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #3 I'm from Vietnam. / Learn how to say where you're from. The formula is the name of the place, followed by "kara kimashita".

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: A festival of floats decorated with locally grown vegetables parades the streets in early October in gratitude for an abundant harvest.

programme.title: Wild Hokkaido!
programme.desc: Hike a snow-covered mountain and explore the superb scenery enlivened by the bitter cold of winter. We'll find monstrous creations of ice and snow found only in winter. What wonderous sights await?

programme.title: Biz Stream

programme.title: Little Charo

programme.title: Japanology Plus Mini

programme.title: Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - In 1989, through the joint collaboration of the Catalan Autonomous Government, the Montmeló Town Council and the Royal Automobile Club of Catalunya (RACC), work began on giving one of Europe’s most beautiful cities a state of the art race track to match. The Circuit de Catalunya opened on the doorstep of Barcelona in September 1991 and welcomed its first international event that same month, hosting the Spanish F1 Grand Prix. It went on to host the European Motorcycle Grand Prix and in 1995 became home to the Gran Premio de Catalunya. Considered to be one of the best designed circuits of the recent era, the Circuito de Catalunya won the much coveted IRTA ‘Best Grand Prix’ trophy for 2001 and has a general admission capacity of 104,000 spectators.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2304
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 287: Pereira vs. Adesanya 2
programme.desc: Prelims - After one of the most memorable middleweight title fights in UFC history, Alex Pereira and Israel Adesanya will run it back in the main event of UFC 287 on April 8, with Pereira vowing to put an end to this rivalry once and for all, while Adesanya looks to regain the crown and even the score. In the co- main event at Miami-Dade Arena in Miami, Florida, it’s the long-awaited return of hometown hero Jorge Masvidal, as he faces number five ranked welterweight contender Gilbert Burns, who is fresh from a big win over Neil Magny in Rio de Janeiro.
